none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 15, 2022 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Like free jazz of the digital realm, the finest harsh noise projects can make it seem like you are listening to carefully crafted and intentionally nuanced compositions. For proof of theory, please place headphones over and/or on ears and play SNOW COVERED DEER CORPSE at maximum allowable volume. SNOW COVERED DEER CORPSE
